comment: See Andrew, only Facebook, Google, and Twitter can allow anti white hatred, Islamic terrorism, etc. This setup as blatant & phony as the toy unibomber
amr:
# ::snt See Andrew, only Facebook, Google, and Twitter can allow anti white hatred, Islamic terrorism, etc. This setup as blatant & phony as the toy unibomber
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / see-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Andrew"))
            :ARG1 (p2 / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (a / allow-01
                        :ARG0 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (p3 / publication
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Facebook"))
                              :op2 (c / company
                                    :name (n3 / name
                                          :op1 "Google"))
                              :op3 (p4 / publication
                                    :name (n4 / name
                                          :op1 "Twitter"))
                              :mod (o / only))
                        :ARG1 (a3 / and
                              :op1 (h / hate-01
                                    :ARG1 (p5 / person
                                          :ARG1-of (w / white-02)))
                              :op2 (t / terrorism
                                    :mod (r / religious-group
                                          :name (n5 / name
                                                :op1 "Islamic")))
                              :op3 (e / et-cetera)))))
      :snt2 (a4 / and
            :op1 (b / blatant
                  :domain (s2 / setup
                        :mod (t2 / this)))
            :op2 (p6 / phony
                  :domain s2)
            :ARG2-of (h2 / have-degree-91
                  :ARG1 s2
                  :ARG3 (e2 / equal)
                  :ARG4 (p7 / person
                        :mod (u / unibomber
                              :mod (t3 / toy))))))
